channel.title: Castle Wars shop help

item.title: Castle Wars shop help
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

I want to do a shop for Castle Wars when you get tickets so they can buy things with tickets.

Hereâ€™s the code I did in client.java:

if (MyShopID == 45) { if (playerItemsN[Slot4] >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { deleteItem(4067, GetItemSlot(4067), TotPrice2); addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough Castle Wars Tickets for this item."); } }

I just get one error:

[code]client.java:6883: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable Slot4
location: class client
if (playerItemsN[Slot4] >= TotPrice2) {

1 error
Finished ![/code]

My base is DeltaScape.

Can anyone help me please ?

Thanks.

Read full topic
